page.title: 16Leisure and Recreation
page.content: There are many{clubs, societies}and {locations}where young and old can enjoy themselves. For the more energetic there are putting, bowling and tennis facilities, and a childrens' play area in the Calder Holmes Park. The{local {football team,}Red Star, play here also. The Birchcliffe Centre offers accommodation and detailed information about the Pennine environment. It is a{conference centre}also. Children attend the several Brownie, Guide, Cub and Scout groups as well as several Sunday Schools and Youth Clubs. A relatively new organisation for children is the{'Woodcraft Folk' whose principles are peace and cooperation. The group meets on a weekly basis and the children take part in creative activities.
